richtext.name: n1
richtext.text: When 3 appear on the reels, the LINK GAME is triggered. There are 3 reels in LINK GAME. Initially, only the bottom reel is unlocked. Collecting can unlock new reels. The game starts with 3 spins. If appear on the reels, the number of spins will be reset to 3. If the bonuses on the reels are connected in a row, column, or oblique line, the bonuses in that row, column, or oblique line will be collected into the reel bonus pool above the reel. If the bonuses on the top reel are connected in a row, column, or oblique line, they will be awarded directly. When the number of game spins reaches 0, the scores from the two bonus pools will be collected as the final reward.
